summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating portions of Renton Avenue South, South Genesee and Oregon Streets, Tamarack and Sears Drives South, Kinnikinick and Heather Places South, Viburnum, Abelia, Barberry, Locust, Chestnut Sumac, and Escallonia Courts South, and Columbian Way South on the petition of the Seattle Housing Authority; approving and confirming the plat of "Rainier Vista", a replat of a portion of Section 16, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; accepting a Replacement Property Use and Development Agreement, and immediately releasing easements for Phase I and providing for future release of easements in Phase II of the Rainier Vista HOPE VI Redevelopment Project, in relation therein, (C.F. 304248 and Subdivision Application No. 2000638, C.F. 304451).
